games.title: hello-world
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description: Example game for the hackerpet hub, hosted on the hackerpet-games repository.

games.title: hello-animal
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description: An introduction to the basics of building hackerpet interactions. It will wait until the Hub's Device Layer is in a good state, then turn on the main lights, and then wait for one of the Hub's touchpads to be touched.

games.title: WhackAMole
games.author: CleverPet <hello@clever.pet>
games.description: Once your dog or cat can see the lights easily, this is a more "active" game for the Hub that challenges your dog or cat's "paw-eye" coordination
